channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Maurice Odum completes tough shot through traffic for the and-one, ASU trails UCLA at half
item.description: Maurice Odum completed tough shot through traffic for the and-one, the Arizona State Sun Devils trail the UCLA Bruins at half

item.title: 2026 NFL Draft Declarations Tracker: ND's Jadarian Price, USC's Makai Lemon
item.description: Which underclassmen have declared for the 2026 NFL Draft? Here's a look which players plan to enter the draft.

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 16 Buzz: Rams' Flight to Seattle for TNF 'Significantly Delayed'
item.description: We're down to the final three weeks of the 2025 NFL regular season, with each bit of news across the league becoming more and more critical.

item.title: College Football Playoff Predictions: First-Round Winners to The National Champion
item.description: FOX Sports' RJ Young reveals his College Football Playoff bracket predictions ahead of the first round of action.

item.title: Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes Eyeing Week 1 Return In 2026 After ACL Surgery
item.description: Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes has started rehab after surgery to repair two torn knee ligaments.

item.title: Rematches, underdogs and chaotic teams -- We've got it all in this CFP first round
item.description: Can this year's CFP match 2024's first round? It certainly won't lack for storylines.

item.title: Even in retirement, Nick Saban's fingerprints are all over the CFP
item.description: Five of the head coaches in the playoff worked under and learned from Alabama's legendary leader.

item.title: 150 prospects, 12 schools, 7 rounds: We stacked players in the CFP by NFL draft stock
item.description: We picked out every CFP player who could factor into the 2026 NFL draft from Round 1 to Round 7.

item.title: Free agency reset: Predictions for the remaining top 10
item.description: A number of impact players are off the market, but there are still big names to be signed. Where do they fit best?

item.title: Passan's hot stove temperature check: What's next in MLB free agency and on the trade market
item.description: While we wait for the next big moves, here's which offseason areas are red-hot -- and which are ice-cold.
